title: Planning for a Lan Tournament in Auckland City

embed.description: Event Timing: To be announced once enough registration received(Email or wechat) Event Address: GIGA Net 65 wakefield street, Auckland CBD Contact us at 021916080 Joe or by Wechat 81166939 Winning Prize: to be announced once enough registration recevied. Registration Fee : to be announced with Prize pool once enough registration received.

body:
Hi summoners,
I am planning for a Lan tournament in Auckland City central, register open at https://forms.gle/Vv5HEvs5UgjvciKj8, the date would be announced when enough teams are registered. 

The prize pool would definitely be over 1k NZD or equivalent.

replies.body: 8 teams been registered so far planning for 16 teams.
